alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:37PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Monroe County through 230 PM EDT... At 136 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Milan to near Monroe. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Carleton around 210 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Newport, Cone, Estral Beach, South Rockwood, Woodland Beach, Stony Point, Bolles Harbor, Azalia, Scofield and Oakville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
